questions.question: In which year did World War II end?
questions.explanation: World War II ended in 1945 with the surrender of Germany in May and Japan in August

questions.question: Who was the first President of the United States?
questions.explanation: George Washington served as the first President of the United States from 1789 to 1797

questions.question: When did the Industrial Revolution begin in England?
questions.explanation: The Industrial Revolution began in Great Britain in the late 18th century (1760-1840)
